scenario.title: User runs a single story
scenario.step: Given user is on Home page
When user opens Run Story page
Then Run Story page is shown
When user runs story "Given a threshold of 10.0 When the stock is traded at 5.0 Then the alert status should be OFF When the stock is traded at 11.0 Then the alert status should be ON"
Then run is successful within timeout of 10 secs
